annotation.spannedText: Malaria is easy to prevent and the dickens to cure

classMention.mentionClass: Malaria is easy to prevent and the dickens to cure

annotation.spannedText: The CDC is very conservative, but, pretty much every physician I know goes by their recommendations

classMention.mentionClass: The CDC is very conservative, but, pretty much every physician I know goes by their recommendations

annotation.spannedText: Sounds like a smart doctor since some of the drugs can have much worse side effects than the disease

classMention.mentionClass: Sounds like a smart doctor since some of the drugs can have much worse side effects than the disease

annotation.spannedText: It's extremely rare here, and it's the vivax strain, so it's easily curable

classMention.mentionClass: It's extremely rare here, and it's the vivax strain, so it's easily curable

annotation.spannedText: The other disease you should be aware of is dengue fever

classMention.mentionClass: The other disease you should be aware of is dengue fever

annotation.spannedText: since there is no prophylactic, it's more important that prevention is sought by reducing the habitat and the number of mosquitoes and limiting exposure to bites

classMention.mentionClass: since there is no prophylactic, it's more important that prevention is sought by reducing the habitat and the number of mosquitoes and limiting exposure to bites

annotation.spannedText: it's up to you to assess your own risk

classMention.mentionClass: it's up to you to assess your own risk

annotation.spannedText: Tetanus & hepatitis shots are something you should have anyway, wherever you live

classMention.mentionClass: Tetanus & hepatitis shots are something you should have anyway, wherever you live

annotation.spannedText: If you're traveling to an area that has yellow fever, you really need to get vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: If you're traveling to an area that has yellow fever, you really need to get vaccinated

annotation.spannedText: The final verdict should be between you and a physician who knows something about travel medicine

classMention.mentionClass: The final verdict should be between you and a physician who knows something about travel medicine

annotation.spannedText: everyone should be vaccinated against Hepatitis A & B

classMention.mentionClass: everyone should be vaccinated against Hepatitis A & B

annotation.spannedText: Everyone should also keep their tetanus up to date

classMention.mentionClass: Everyone should also keep their tetanus up to date

annotation.spannedText: It doesn't really matter how much insect repellant, Skin So Soft you apply, there's always one that gets through it and that could be the one

classMention.mentionClass: It doesn't really matter how much insect repellant, Skin So Soft you apply, there's always one that gets through it and that could be the one

annotation.spannedText: do contact your local travel clinic to make sure

classMention.mentionClass: do contact your local travel clinic to make sure

annotation.spannedText: They probably have better web sites than you or I can easily access.

classMention.mentionClass: They probably have better web sites than you or I can easily access.

annotation.spannedText: After reading the WHO website and the CDC website, I think you'll be fine

classMention.mentionClass: After reading the WHO website and the CDC website, I think you'll be fine
